prathijiwaka nipayum kamhala madapatha di areshri lankawe athi nuthana nishpadana pahasukam sahitha ekama sefolosporin prathijiwaka aushadha nipadawime karmantha shalawa piliyandala madapatha di intarfarm samagame sabhapathi / kalamanakara adhyaksha, kalana hewa mallika mahathage pradhanathwayen pasugiya da wiwrutha keruni.ehidi kalana hewa mallika mahatha pawasuwe, ‘1992 mayi sathwana dina mage diwangatha piya wana gamani hewa mallika mahatha arambau gama farmasutikals samagama me wana wita athu wihidi athi nuthana yanthra suthra sahitha shri lankawe ekama sefolosporin prathijiwaka karmantha shalawa arambaima dakwa paminimata hakiwima wishala sathutak.
